title: Mount Rushmore National Memorial: Lodging
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Lodging              Lodging       Lodging is available in many nearby communities. South Dakota Tourism and Black Hills and Badlands Tourism Association offer information about many of the options.  The community chambers of commerce listed below can also help you find lodging: Keystone, SD, Chamber of Commerce (3 miles from Mount Rushmore) Hill City, SD, Chamber of Commerce (approximately 13 miles from Mount Rushmore) Custer, SD, Chamber of Commerce (20 miles from Mount Rushmore) Rapid City, SD, Convention and Visitors Bureau (24 miles from Mount Rushmore)
